text: For the Kushāna–Sasanian conflicts (367–368), we learn from the Armenian historian, Faustos of Byzantium that "the Kushānas inflicted two crushing defeats on the Sassanians in A.D. 367-68 and on one occasion even forced Shapur II to fly from the battlefield." == References == Category:Pages created with the Article Wizard from 2024 Category:Kushan Empire Category:Ancient India Category:Wars involving Asia
title: Kushāna–Sasanian conflicts
